description: A cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerUcastThresholdExceeded is sent
when for a given container profile, the number of unknown unicast
packets received becomes greater than or equal to the
configuration packet limit, and the value of unknown unicast packet
received at the last sampling interval was less than
the configuration packet limit. To enable the device to send this notificatio
cienaCesDataplaneUcastTrapState needs to be set to enabled. The
cienaCesDataplaneUcastTrapState is set to enabled by default. Variable bindings include
cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifProfileIndex
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiType,
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiIndex,
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerProfileName, and
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerAttachmentInterfaceName.

event.Summary: Flood container unicast packets exceeded the threshold

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerUcastThresholdExceeded CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifProfileIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiType i 1 CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerProfileName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerAttachmentInterfaceName s EXAMPLE

description: A cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerUcastThresholdNormal is sent
when for a given container profile, the total number of
unknown unicast packet received becomes less than the
configured packet limit, and the value of unknown unicast
packets received at the last sampling interval
was greater than or equal to the configured packet limit.
To enable the device to send this notification, cienaCesDataplaneUcastTrapState
needs to be set to enabled. The cienaCesDataplaneUcastTrapState is set to
enabled by default. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity,
cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifProfileIndex,
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiType,
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiIndex,
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerProfileName, and
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerAttachmentInterfaceName.

description: A cienaCesDataplaneEgressReflectorEnabled is sent
when the egress reflector feature is enabled for the
given sub-port.

event.Summary: Egress reflector feature is enabled for sub-port $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDataplaneEgressReflectorEnabled CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpSubPortName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpSubPortLiIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpSubPortEgressReflectorMac s EXAMPL CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpSubPortEgressGeneratorMac s EXAMPL

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: This object represents a unique name of the sub-port.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpSubPortName

description: This object represents a unique index into the table.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpSubPortLiIndex

description: This object specifies the MAC address of the egress reflector when enabled.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpSubPortEgressReflectorMac

description: This object specifies the generator MAC address of the egress reflector when enabled.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpSubPortEgressGeneratorMac

description: A cienaCesDataplaneEgressReflectorDisabled is sent
when the egress reflector feature is disabled for the
given sub-port.

event.Summary: Egress reflector feature is disabled for sub-port $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDataplaneEgressReflectorDisabled CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpSubPortName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpSubPortLiIndex i 9999

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: This object represents a unique name of the sub-port.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpSubPortName

description: This object represents a unique index into the table.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpSubPortLiIndex

description: A cienaCesDpPortShapingSubscriptionExceedsOperSpeed is sent when
when ports operational speed becomes lesser than port scheduler
cir value. To enable the device to send this notification,
cienaCesDataplanePortShapingSubscriptionTrapState needs to be set to enabled. The
cienaCesDataplanePortShapingSubscriptionTrapState is set to enabled by default. Variable
bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber and
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortName

event.Summary: Port $v7 shaping subscription exceeded operational speed

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpPortShapingSubscriptionExceedsOperSpeed CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex u 0 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber u 9999 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortName s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The object indicates the chassis index for the port used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex

description: The object indicates the shelf index for the port used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex

description: The object indicates the slot index for the port used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex

description: The object indicates the port number for the corresponding PGID
used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber

description: A textual string containing information about the
port. This string should indicate the physical
location of the port as well.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortName

description: A cienaCesDpPortShapingSubscriptionWithinOperSpeed is sent
when ports operational speed becomes equal or greater than port scheduler
cir value. To enable the device to send this notification,
cienaCesDataplanePortShapingSubscriptionTrapState needs to be set to enabled. The
cienaCesDataplanePortShapingSubscriptionTrapState is set to enabled by default. Variable
bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber and
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortName

event.Summary: Port $v7 shaping subscription is within operational speed

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpPortShapingSubscriptionWithinOperSpeed CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex u 0 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber u 9999 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortName s EXAMPLE

description: The object indicates the port number for the corresponding PGID
used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber

description: A textual string containing information about the
port. This string should indicate the physical
location of the port as well.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortName

description: A cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerTotalThresholdExceeded is sent
when for a given container profile, the total number of packets
received becomes greater than or equal to the aggregate of all
packet limits configured for the container profile, and the
value of received packets at the last sampling interval is less
than the aggregate of configured packet limits. To enable the
device to send this notification, cienaCesDataplaneXcastTrapState
needs to be set to enabled. The cienaCesDataplaneXcastTrapState
is set to enabled by default. Variable bindings include:
cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifProfileIndex,
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiType,
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiIndex,
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerProfileName, and
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerAttachmentInterfaceName.

event.Summary: Flood container total number of packets exceeded the threshold

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerTotalThresholdExceeded CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifProfileIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiType i 1 CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerProfileName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerAttachmentInterfaceName s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: This object specifies a unique index into the table used in the trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifProfileIndex

description: This object specifies the logical interface type with which this
flood container is associated. This object is used in
the trap definitions.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiType

description: This object specifies the index of the logical interface with which this
flood container is associated. The type of the interface is
identified by the object cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiType.
This object is used in the trap definitions.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiIndex

description: This object specifies a unique profile name for the meter flood container.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerProfileName

description: This object specifies the name of the logical interface with which this
flood container is associated. The type of the interface is
identified by the object cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerAttachmentLiType.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerAttachmentInterfaceName

description: A cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerTotalThresholdNormal is sent
when for a given container profile, the total number of packets
received becomes less than the aggregate of all packet limits
configured for the container profile, and the value of received
packets at the last sampling interval is greater than or equal
to the aggregate of configured packet limits. To enable the
device to send this notification ,cienaCesDataplaneXcastTrapState
needs to be set to enabled. The cienaCesDataplaneXcastTrapState
is set to enabled by default. Variable bindings include:
cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress,
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifProfileIndex,
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiType,
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiIndex,
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerProfileName, and
cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerAttachmentInterfaceName.

event.Summary: Flood container total number of packets threshold alarm cleared

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerTotalThresholdNormal CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifProfileIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiType i 1 CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerNotifAttachmentLiIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerProfileName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-DATAPLANE-MIB::cienaCesDpTsMeterFloodContainerAttachmentInterfaceName s EXAMPLE
